body: Nice, a continuation of the author's best work.

I'm going to take the alias of faggot slayer or some shit like that and eliminate all the bara authors from the face of earth one by one, I don't care how much money or time it would take to eliminate them all, I will do it no matter the cost. if one day I accidentally messed up and get caught please some continue my legacy and make sure those fuckers have the weirdest and painful death possible <3
